messages.text:
Hello nigeltao@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://crawshaw%40google.com@code.google.com/p/graphics-go/

LGTM.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5169044/diff/4001/graphics/thumbnail.go
File graphics/thumbnail.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5169044/diff/4001/graphics/thumbnail.go#newcode31
graphics/thumbnail.go:31: pt := image.Pt(0, 0)
I would write "var pt image.Point".

http://codereview.appspot.com/5169044/diff/4001/graphics/thumbnail_test.go
File graphics/thumbnail_test.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5169044/diff/4001/graphics/thumbnail_test.go#newcode8
graphics/thumbnail_test.go:8: "testing"
Sort imports.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5169044/diff/4001/graphics/thumbnail.go
File graphics/thumbnail.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5169044/diff/4001/graphics/thumbnail.go#newcode31
graphics/thumbnail.go:31: pt := image.Pt(0, 0)
On 2011/10/04 06:52:52, nigeltao wrote:
> I would write "var pt image.Point".

Done.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5169044/diff/4001/graphics/thumbnail_test.go
File graphics/thumbnail_test.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5169044/diff/4001/graphics/thumbnail_test.go#newcode8
graphics/thumbnail_test.go:8: "testing"
On 2011/10/04 06:52:52, nigeltao wrote:
> Sort imports.

Done.

*** Submitted as f2cc2bc2e762 ***

graphics: add Thumbnail function

subject: code review 5169044: graphics: add Thumbnail function
